title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (about 30 seconds in my case) and no busy cursor is shown.
EB: The updating of checkboxes should use a busy cursor to indicate that the operation is in progress.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open a workspace with many projects.2. Go to the export Zip function.3. Select all projects.4. Choose some file types.5. Press the OK button.
